name: Fragile Arms
description:
Created for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam.

Using the theme of ONLY ONE, each weapon only has one shot before it shatters, so take careful aim. In addition to this, you have ONLY ONE health, and mustn't touch any of the dangerous slimes.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - MOVEMENT
  • MOUSE - AIM
  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - SHOOT
  • ESC - PAUSE
